# InstaMoment Lab

InstaMoment Lab is a Korean practical engineering publication focused on web development operations, AI feature integration, and deployment reliability.

## Canonical
- https://wgwgw.pages.dev/

## Core Guides
- [Requirements Definition 4 Steps](https://wgwgw.pages.dev/guide-requirements-definition): A practical framework for defining problem statements, user scenarios, success metrics, and release scope.
- [Portfolio Structure Guide](https://wgwgw.pages.dev/guide-portfolio-structure): A trust-oriented information architecture for home/about/contact/privacy pages.
- [Teachable Machine Checklist](https://wgwgw.pages.dev/guide-teachable-machine-checklist): Checklist for model integration, error handling, UX copy, and data handling policy.
- [Content Ops Routine](https://wgwgw.pages.dev/guide-content-ops-routine): Editorial and operational routine prioritizing content quality before ad density.

## Governance Pages
- [About](https://wgwgw.pages.dev/about)
- [Contact](https://wgwgw.pages.dev/contact)
- [Privacy Policy](https://wgwgw.pages.dev/privacy)

## Machine-readable Feeds
- [Sitemap](https://wgwgw.pages.dev/sitemap.xml)
- [RSS](https://wgwgw.pages.dev/feed.xml)
